question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Mengapa Kota Bogor, Indonesia dikenal sebagai "Kota Hujan"?
answer: Kota Bogor, Indonesia dikenal sebagai "Kota Hujan" karena memiliki curah hujan yang sangat tinggi hampir sepanjang tahun.
answer_translated_eng: Bogor City, Indonesia is known as the "City of Rain" because it has very high rainfall almost all year round.
